creator: Alphainventor
description:
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

3.6.5 - Temporarily highlight new files with a dot after file operations.
3.5.0 - Slideshow feature added.
3.2.9 - Supports favorites order change and network storage order change.
2.8.0 - Target Android 11. Requires 'All files access' permission on Android 11 or higher to read and write shared storage.

creator: topjohnwu
description: Magisk is a powerful systemless rooting solution for Android devices. It provides root access without modifying the system partition and supports modules for extending system functionality.

creator: Meta
description:
A faster Facebook experience for Android.

Download size: 3.33 MB.
This version of Facebook uses less data and works in all network conditions.

Facebook Lite:
- Small app size for faster installation and reduced storage usage.
- Faster Facebook experience. Upload photos and see updates quickly.
- Works on 2G networks and unstable connections.
- Supports all Android phones.

Compatibility: Android 2.3 or higher.
Last Updated: February 27, 2026.
Languages: English (US), Filipino, Bisaya, Español, 日本語, 한국어, 中文(简体), العربية, Português (Brasil), Français (France), Deutsch.

creator: Mohammed Refat
